data.text: Jisu'n asiya aleiloon phakhan, ama'n injuonei makheiya amit kacho miring inkhat aleimu.
Asiamruoi ngai'n amadiang inleirakel, “Karu, tume manu katho, hiwa mipa hibe emakli anu apa ngai manu jarrabe ama'n amit cho-ah injuoneihi?”
Jisu'n aleimasang, “Ama mit kachohi ama manu emakli anu apa manu jarra emak, takkha Pathian ranak kha ama chungnga chuon inlarnasik eii.
Kani omlaiseng kei kanajuotir ama chuonkha eini'n nithosik eii; tuteii innum chuon thothamak nasik zaan kha aheiwajei.
Kei'n manmasituolla kaomlaiseng, kei manmasituol war kha ka eii.” Matt 5:14; Jn 8:12
Hiwa atisuo nuk-ah, Jisu'n neipilla aleimachil khat-um amachil kha rahut khale aleikamet halli dialdook kha miringpa mit-ah aleikanoot
halli amadiang aleiti, “Siro, halli Siloam (Siloam tinachu itir tina eii) tuikuong khan namai juophero.” Miringpa khan asiya amai ajuophe, halli amit amuwa ahongkir.
A-indiang inwaipui khat-um matiang ama'n baksik ileini kaleimu mi-ngai'n inleiti, “Hiwa mipahi in-ong jolla baksik kanani kachak pakha emak abe?”
Mi lekkhat in inleiti, “Ama hi eii,” leiilaak ngai'n “Emak takkha amale inpuokeeng” inleiti.
Inmani'n amadiang inleiti, “Ang omchanna nang in namit nihongmume?”
Ama'n aleimasang, “Jisu inti miring inkhat in dialdook aboolla, kamit-ah akanoot-ah anati, Siloamma siro halli namai juophero; Khawa jarra kei'n kasiya kamai kajuophe li kei'n kamit kamujei.”
Inmani'n inleirakel, “Ama hun ommejei?”
Inmani ngai'n amit kaleicho miring pakha Pharisee ngaidiang inleiruoi.
Jisu'n dialdook boolla khat-um amit kachopa aleimindamna kha Sabbath nikhuoni alei eii.

Pharisee ngai'n, woikhat inlet-ah mipadiang angtho tholia namit nihongmume tia inleirakelnook. Ama'n inmani diang aleiti, “Ama'n dialdook kamit-ah akanoot; kei'n kamai kajuophe, halli kei'n kamujei.”
Pharisee lekkhat ngai'n inleiti, “Hiwa katho miring kha Pathian diang makheiya emak, ajarchu ama'n Sabbath kha juimak.”
Khawa jarra Pharisee ngai'n mitkacho padiang woikhat inlet-ah inleirakelrit, “Nangleii amahi tu-eii natime? tichu ama'n nang namit naminmujei.”
Jihudi ngai'n anu apa inleikoimak laisengchu ama kha amit leicho khat-um tuun ihongmu ejei tihi lei-ngamnamu,
khawa jarra inmani diang inleirakel, “Hiwahi nangni'n amit cho-ah kinjuonei eii ningti nangni sapa kha ebo? halle, angtho tholia ama'n tuunchu imume?”
Anu li apa khan inleimasang, “Keini'n kinjet amahi keini sapa kha eii, khat-um amit cho-ah kinjuonei eii.
Takkha ang omchanna ama'n tuunchu imume khachu keini'n jetmung, khale inruoiya ama mit-hi tu miring imindamme keini'n jetmung. Amadiang rakelru; amahi naipang emakjei, ama apum tak-in rilrase.”
Anu li apa'n Jihudi ngai inleichi jarra hiwahi inleiti, ajarchu Jihudi ngai inzootna aleiom, khachu Jisu hi Messiah eii kati miring kha Synagogue makheiya inpuutsik eii.
Khawa jarra anu li apa khan, “Amahi naipang emakjei, amadiang rakelru inleiti!”
Khawa jarra inmani'n amit kaleichopa kha woikhat inlet-ah inkoirit-ah amadiang inleiti, “Pathian kha minpaakro; keini'n miring pakha manu karoon mi eii tikha kinjet.”
Ama'n aleimasang, “Ama kha manu karoon mibe emakbe, kei'n jetmong; kei'n inkhatchu kajet, Kei kamit aleicho, tuunchu kei kamujei.”
Inmani'n amadiang inleirakel, “Ama'n nangdiang angme itho? angtho tholi ama'n namit kacho imindamme?”
Ama'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Kei'n nangnidiang katisuojei, halli nangni'n rangaimakchu. angjarra nangni'n inlet-ah ninglara-ngai zootme? Nangni-um ama siamruoi ngai ning-ezootbe?”
Inmani'n amadiang inranna inleiti, “Nangchu ama siamruoi na eii, takkha keinichu Moses siamruoi kin eii.
Pathian in Moses le ilei inbiak khachu keini'n kinjet, takkha hiwa miringpa jarrachu ama humakheiya kaheiwame eini'n iteii jetmakmi.”
Miring pa'n aleimasang, “Hiwahi angtuk-ah ngak kaomme, angjarra nangni'n amahi humakheiya ijuome ningjetmak, takkha ama'n kei kamit kacho hichu imindam.
Eini'n nijet Pathian in manu karoon miring ngaidiang ra-ngaimak, takkha amadiang chubei katho khat-um ama lungdou katho mi ngai diangchu, Pathian in arangai.
Manmasituol hong-injirra inphut tuteii miring inkhat innum amit cho-ah injuonei miring amit kaminmurit lajetmakmi.
Hiwa miring pahi Pathian diang makheiya kajuo emak inchu, ama'n iteii thomator nuni.”
Inmani'n amadiang inleimasang, “Nang manule inruoiya innajuonei, halli nang in keinidiang nanaminchu sikbe?” halli inmani'n ama kha Synagogue makheiya inleipuutjei.
Jisu'n ama kha inpuutjei tikha aleijet, halli Jisu'n ama kha alei-intongpuiya aleiti, “Nang Miring Sapa diang na-ngamnabo?”
Ama'n aleimasang, “Karu, kei'n ama diang ka-ngam nasik-ah, ama kha tume natipiro!”
Jisu'n amadiang aleiti, “Nang in ama kha namujei, tuun nangdiang karilla kaom ama kha eii.”
Ama'n aleiti, “Pumi, Kei ka-ngamnajei!” halli ama'n Jisu diang chubei aleitho.
Jisu'n aleiti, “Kamumak ngai'n inmunasik, halli akamu ngai'n inmit chonasik kei'n manmasituolla chongkatan kijuo kha eii.”
Pharisee lekkhat ama koolla kaom ngai'n hiwa chonghi injet-ah amadiang inleiti, “Keini ngai-um kinmit chobejei?”
Jisu'n inmani diang aleimasang, “Nangni ningmit aleicho inchu, nangni'n manu karoon kha lei-enutun; takkha tuundet nangni'n keini kinmu ningti jarra, nangni manu karoon kha ningla-eii.”
